author: Shane Magee
description: Moncton council has voted to sell downtown property for an undisclosed amount to a developer pitching a mixed-use building with 10 per cent of the residential units described as affordable housing.

description: If the only restaurant at the Greater Moncton Roméo LeBlanc International Airport hadn’t eventually opened, Mike Wazny and his girlfriend, who were en route to Winnipeg after a trip out east, would have been waiting at least nine hours without any food.

content:
